extensionDescription.message: Faster way to access the websites used to localize / translate Mozilla products and projects into your language.

pontoonLinkTooltip.message: Translation tools for Mozilla products and websites

pontoonTerminologyLinkTooltip.message: Search in Pontoon how an expression has been translated in other strings

transvisionLinkTooltip.message: Tool to search how other l10n teams have translated a string

glossaryLinkTooltip.message: Set of standard terms adopted in translations

styleGuideLinkTooltip.message: Guide containing best practices for localization adopted by the team

webdashboardLinkTooltip.message: Overview of Mozilla projects translation status
